alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 2:59AM MST until March 11 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick or snow covered road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to less than one half mile at times. Snow drifting onto the roadway could also make roads difficult to navigate in spots.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County
